description: Returns the task assessment results from the Amazon S3 bucket that DMS creates in your Amazon Web Services account. This action always returns the latest results. For more information about DMS task assessments, see Creating a task assessment report in the Database Migration Service User Guide.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket where the task assessment report is located.
The Amazon S3 bucket where the task assessment report is located.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskIdentifier
nested_items.description: The replication task identifier of the task on which the task assessment was run.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication task.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskLastAssessmentDate
nested_items.description: The date the task assessment was completed.

nested_items.name: AssessmentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the task assessment.

nested_items.name: AssessmentResultsFile
nested_items.description: The file containing the results of the task assessment.

nested_items.name: AssessmentResults
nested_items.description: The task assessment results in JSON format.

nested_items.name: S3ObjectUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the S3 object containing the task assessment results.
